text: Vahe'mofo mofavremoka, Jerusalemi kumate'ma mago'ama mani'naza vahe'mo'za hu'za, kafuhe'zane kagranema magokama kinama hutama mani'naza nagamotane maka Israeli vahe'motagu'enena hu'za, Ra Anumzamofo tava'ontetira atre'za afete umani'nazageno, ama mopa eri santihareho huno tagri ko tami'ne hu'za Jerusalemi vahe'mo'za nehaze.
